member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateCalculationController
member.summary: This controller provides all necessary functions to implement an FP style product calculation

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateCalculationController.GetActiveTables(System.DateTime)
member.summary: returns a list of rate tables from the database with only the currently active table for each variant
member.param: if a value is specified only rate tables with a valid from date lower than the specified one are returned

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateCalculationController.CreateEnvironment(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a basic product table environment.

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateCalculationController.StartProductCalculation(FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Common.ProductCalculation.ApiRequests.StartCalculationRequest)
member.summary: Starts the rate calculation process.
member.param: Parameter container storing initial weight and product table environment.

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateCalculationController.CalculateProduct(FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Common.ProductCalculation.ApiRequests.CalculateRequest)
member.summary: Performs a calculation step in the product calculation process
member.param: The calculation request storing the product table environment, the description of the product prior to the calculation step and the step to be performed with the next calculation .

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateCalculationController.StepBack(FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Common.ProductCalculation.ApiRequests.UpdateRequest)
member.summary: Performs one step back in the product calculation wizard
member.param: The step back request storing the product table environment and the description of the product prior to the step back.

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateCalculationController.UpdateWeight(FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Common.ProductCalculation.ApiRequests.UpdateRequest)
member.summary: Updates the weight for the current product.
member.param: The update request storing the product table environment and the description of the product prior to the update weight.

member.name: T:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateTableAdministrationController
member.summary: This controller provides all necessary functions to administer FP style product calculation rate tables. These methods are protected. For you to be able to administer rate tables you need to login using the FP authentication API and your user account needs to be assigned to the correct role

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateTableAdministrationController.GetAllRateTables(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all RateTables from the database
member.param: if set to true the Package file data is appended (long transmission time)

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateTableAdministrationController.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: returns a rate table specified by database id

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateTableAdministrationController.GetRateTables(FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Common.ProductCalculation.ApiRequests.GetRateTableRequest)
member.summary: returns rate tables from the database using the filters provided. this method also includes paging mechanisms

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateTableAdministrationController.AddNewRateTable(FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Common.RateTable.RateTableInfo)
member.summary: Adds a new RateTable to the database

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateTableAdministrationController.UpdateTable(FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Common.RateTable.RateTableInfo)
member.summary: updates an existing rate table info in the database

member.name: M:FP.Cloud.OnlineRateTable.Controllers.RateTableAdministrationController.DeleteById(System.Int32)
member.summary: deletes an rate table database entry
member.param: id of the rate table to be deleted
